<fim_prefix>package org.eclipse.xtext.parser.antlr.idea.lang.parser.antlr;

import java.io.InputStream;
import org.eclipse.xtext.parser.antlr.IAntlrTokenFileProvider;

<fim_suffix>public class Bug378967TestLanguageAntlrTokenFileProvider implements IAntlrTokenFileProvider {
	
	@Override
	public InputStream getAntlrTokenFile() {
		ClassLoader classLoader = getClass().getClassLoader();
    	return classLoader.getResourceAsStream("org/eclipse/xtext/parser/antlr/idea/parser/antlr/internal/PsiInternalBug378967TestLanguage.tokens");
	}
}<fim_middle>// class below has no smell
